Text: Game won't start, says it can't find the file CryEA.dll despite the fact that my anti-virus is disabled and I can plainly see it in the Crysis 3/Win32 directory. Any ideas?

Update, I downloaded the second crackfix from Ghostnet and it worked just fine. MeMar, could you check and make sure that your files are not corrupted in any way? It looks like the crack is unable to find the DLL.

I haven't got to the final boss scene yet, so I can't verify that the fix works, but I can state that this crack did work as far as saving, & loading is concerned without screwing up your current saves, so,.....so far, so good. Thanks MeMar, cheers.
